<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92783</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92783</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion d'un miroir</string>
            <string language="en">Mirror reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegelreflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão do espelho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione dello specchio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση καθρεφτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión del espejo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière est  réfléchie suivant le même angle quand elle frappe le miroir.  Première sur deux séries illustrant comment on peut réfléchir lumière afin de la renvoyer là d'où elle vient.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light is reflected in the same angle as it strikes the mirror.  First of two series illustrating how light can be made to reflect back to where it came from.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle de réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">angle of reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Licht im gleichen 
Winkel reflektiert wird, dem es den Spiegel anschlägt. Von 
zuerst von zwei Serien, die veranschaulichen, wie Licht gebildet 
werden kann, um sich zu reflektieren zurück zu, wo es kam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz está refletida
no mesmo ângulo que golpeia o espelho. Primeiramente de duas 
séries que ilustram como a luz pode ser feita para refletir para 
trás a onde veio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce è 
riflessa nello stesso angolo come colpisce lo specchio. In primo
luogo di due serie che illustrano come la luce può essere fatta per 
riflettere di nuovo a dove è venuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το φως απεικονίζεται 
στην ίδια γωνία όπως χτυπά τον καθρέφτη. Πρώτα δύο 
σειρών που επεξηγούν πώς το φως μπορεί να γίνει για να 
απεικονίσει πίσω όπου προήλθε από.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz está 
reflejada en el mismo ángulo que pulso el espejo. Primero de 
dos series que ilustran cómo la luz se puede hacer para reflejar de 
nuevo a donde vino.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel der Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo de incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo de reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo dell'incidenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo della riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία της πρόσπτωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία της αντανάκλασης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθρέφτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo de la incidencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo de la reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
